Job.Title: Digital Media Specialist
Description: Assisted hundreds of University of Rochester students in the use of Adobe suite software, 3D printing software, and Makerbot 3D printers.
Maintained and secured the equipment in the Rettner Media Library at the University of Rochester.

Job.Title: Manufacturing Team Lead
Description: Developed and maintained technical documents detailing the manufacturing process of the company's flagship products (Electric Vehicle Charging Stations).
Reduced production overhead by 15% by streamlining the assembly process.
Resolved product quality issues through effective customer care.
Grew the company's three largest customers by 10% over a one-year time period.

Job.Title: Cybersecurity Analyst
Description: Established internal documentation standards for threat hunting and vulnerability patching processes.
Developed and maintained documentation used for federal CMMC security compliance.
Created Python Automation scripts for security report generation.
Performed security analysis on Splunk Enterprise Security and Elasticsearch Data.
Analyzed hundreds of potential cyber threats from an 8000+ user base.
Assisted in the implementation of  SEIM tools to safeguard MITLL's information assets.

experience.Title: Head Swim Coach
Description: Lead a team of 15+ adult athletes.
Motivated over 50% of athletes to reach new person records.
Organized and managed team excursions to regional competitions.

experience.Title: Concertmaster
Description: Planned and lead section workshops of 15+ musicians.
Coordinated intricate details such as bowings and fingerings amongst multiple sections in the orchestra.
Conveyed musical ideas and integrity through non-verbal communication.
